titles.title: There Once Was A Man Who Was Lame From His Birth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There once was a man who was lame from his birth,
In the gate of the temple he lay.
He was begging for money as he lay on the earth
From all who would pass by his way.
Then two disciples of Jesus named Peter and John
Came and looked him straight in the eye.
They said, We don't have money,
But we'll give you the only thing
That all of your money can't buy.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And he went a-walking and a-leaping and a-praising God.
In the name of the Lord he was healed.
He went a-walking and a-leaping and a-praising God.
For the power of God is so real.
He went a-walking and a-leaping and a-praising God,
And that's the way that I feel!
And he went a-walking and a-leaping and a-praising God.
In the name of the Lord he was healed.
